resources.string: "请根据工程根目录下的Tpatch.txt执行动态部署的过程"

"请根据下面步骤执行单模块替换（用于开发测试）.

"
"1、设备上安装基线版本
" "看到这个界面表示你的设备上已经安装成功demo，成功的开始！

"
"2、修改你的代码或者资源
" "可以通过明显样式的修改或者打log来标识你的修改是否成功，manifest不能修改，新增Component的机制我们后续会尽快支持

"
"3、执行awo构建
"
"Motion respects and reinforces the user as the prime mover. Primary user actions are 

"
"4、将patch产物push倒你的设备上
"
"The material environment is a 3D space, which means all objects have x, y, and z 

"
"5、点击红色按钮执行动态部署
"
"也可以尝试PC上执行adb shell am broadcast sdfsdfsdf -e pkg com.taobao.demo"

"请根据下面步骤执行: 

"
"1、添加远程bundle的依赖， 如 `bundleCompile project(':remotebundle')` ， 参考 app/build.gradle 

"
"2、声明远程bundle列表， 
 atlas { tBuildConfig { outOfApkBundles = ['remotebundle'] } 

"
"3、构建完整包 assembleDebug 
"
apk 路径：app/build/outputs/apk/ 
" 远程bundle 路径：app/build/outputs/remote-bundles-debug 

"
"4、将远程sopush倒你的设备上
"
"可以尝试PC上执行adb push app/build/outputs/remote-bundles-debug/libcom_taobao_remotebunle.so /sdcard/Android/data/com.taobao.demo/cache/libcom_taobao_remotebunle.so 

"
"5、点击下方按钮，加载远程bundle 
"
